react

Class Slot<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • react.Reactor.RListener
      • react.ValueView.Listener<T>
        • react.Slot<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UnitSlot

    public abstract class Slot<T>
extends ValueView.Listener<T>
    Reacts to signal emissions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Slot() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <S extends T>
      Slot<S>      		 andThen(Slot<? super S> after)
      Returns a new slot that invokes this slot and then evokes after.
      <S> Slot<S> compose(Function<S,T> f)
      Returns a slot that maps values via f and then passes them to this slot.
      <S extends T>
      Slot<S>      		 filtered(Function<? super S,Boolean> pred)
      Returns a slot that is only notified when the signal to which this slot is connected emits a value which causes pred to return true.
      void onChange(T value, T oldValue)
      Allows a slot to be used as a ValueView.Listener by passing just the new value through to onEmit(T).
      abstract void onEmit(T event)
      Called when a signal to which this slot is connected has emitted an event.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Slot

        public Slot()

    • Method Detail

      • onEmit

        public abstract void onEmit(T event)
        Called when a signal to which this slot is connected has emitted an event.
        Parameters:
        event - the event emitted by the signal.

      • compose

        public <S> Slot<S> compose(Function<S,T> f)
        Returns a slot that maps values via f and then passes them to this slot. This is essentially function composition in that slot.compose(f) means slot(f(value))) where this slot is treated as a side effecting void function.

      • filtered

        public <S extends T> Slot<S> filtered(Function<? super S,Boolean> pred)
        Returns a slot that is only notified when the signal to which this slot is connected emits a value which causes pred to return true.

      • andThen

        public <S extends T> Slot<S> andThen(Slot<? super S> after)
        Returns a new slot that invokes this slot and then evokes after.

      • onChange

        public final void onChange(T value,
                           T oldValue)
        Allows a slot to be used as a ValueView.Listener by passing just the new value through to onEmit(T).
        Specified by:
        onChange in class ValueView.Listener<T>
